titleStmt.title: Instrvctions agreed upon by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for Sir William Brereton barronet, the members of the House of Commons and for Sir George Booth, knight and barronet and the rest of the deputie lieutenants of the citie and countie of Chester.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: extensive bleeding through on copy.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
